metadata.title: CVE-2021-37218 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: HashiCorp Nomad and Nomad Enterprise Raft RPC layer allows non-server agents with a valid certificate signed by the same CA to access server-only functionality, enabling privilege escalation. Fixed in 1.0.10 and 1.1.4.

criterions.comment: nomad package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
